General.Name: Cencosud
General.Description: Cencosud S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a retail conglomerate in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru, and Colombia. It operates supermarkets, home improvement stores, department stores, shopping centers, and insurance brokerage and family entertainment centers; and provides financial services. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in Las Condes, Chile.

5.Name: Mr. Sebastián Rivera Martínez
5.Title: Corp. Mang. of Legal Affairs and Institutional Relations

7.Name: Mr. Ricardo  Bennett
7.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Department Stores
